page.title: 16Home-Life
page.content: On the south-west corner of our 'D' Block lies Thorpe End.The most famous sporting family in Norfolk live there in a large house. The Brown family consists of Ken Brown, Manager of Norwich City Football Club ,Joan Brown, secretary at Catton Grove Middle School,( She is a keen badminton player and a keep-fit enthusiast),Amanda Brown ,who played tennis in the Olympic Games for Great Britain and in the Wightman Cup and Kenny Brown who has recently been signed as a professional footballer at Norwich City Football Club. As the wife, and mother of sporting personalities Joan must share in both their successes and their failures. Recently she was over-joyed at the Canaries 'success, when they won the Milk Cup. All too soon, however, came the disappointment,Norwich City were
